name: Arcane Recovery
trigger: when you finish a short rest
effects: you can recover expended spell slots with a combined level equal to no more than half your wizard level (round up)
no recovered slot can be level 6 or higher
limits: once you use this feature, you cannot use it again until you finish a long rest
